title: b) All the eligible occupants/tenants of the building(s) undergoing redevelopment shall be rehabilitated in the redeveloped building(s)
clause_text: b) All the eligible occupants/tenants of the building(s) undergoing redevelopment shall be rehabilitated in the redeveloped building(s).
